description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. A collection of six full-length, high-quality games from genres such as action, puzzle, tower defense, platformer, and many more. This was created by over 20 developers, and 100% of the profits from this game will go to benefit the Child's Play charity.
